name: Kevin A. González
bio: Kevin A. González is the author of a chapbook of poems, The Night Tito Trinidad KO'ed Ricardo Mayorga (Momotombo Press, 2007).  His poems have appeared in Poetry, Callaloo, The Progressive and Poetry Northwest, and his stories have appeared in Playboy, Virginia Quarterly Review, Best New American Voices and Best American Nonrequired Reading.  Currently, he is the Carol Houck Smith Fiction Fellow at the University of Wisconsin-Madison.
